specifications.Finish: Chemical > Wicking Wicking is a textile treatment that enables fabric to draw moisture or sweat away from the skin and help it evaporate quickly. This keeps the wearer cool and fresh.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Do not bleach Tumble dry normal low heat Do not iron Do not dry clean Performance Anti-Microbial Fabric with an antibacterial effect created by inserting silver into yarns or through silver nano coating. UV Protection A treatment to reduce fabric exposure to UV rays through application of a UV blocking agent that absorbs or scatters UV rays. Quick Dry Quick dry is a technical fabric that wicks away sweat and moisture, helping to maintain a cool and fresh feeling. Brand Yarn ATB-UV+ ATB-UV+ is the future generation of anti-bacterial fibers. Cutting edge perspiration - absorption/evaporation technologies create a fiber that remains 99.9% bacteria free. Blocks UV-B(290~320mm) & UV-A(320~400mm). Recommended Use Activewear, T-shirts
